overview: Mariska likes to experiment with sex, all kinds of sex, with her husband Joss, her best friend Freddy and her girlfriend, Valentina. Even Freddy's girlfriend, Texas Patti, isn't banned when Mariska joins them both for some naughty double anal fun. And while mom Mariska is away, her daughter Lina and her boyfriend Josh have their own fucking adventure.
title: How to Train a Hot Wife
